message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I think a starting price of $13,000 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $10,000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. I could consider letting it go for $12,000.  This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I've given your offer some thought. I would like to counter with a price of $11,000. I hope this meets somewhere in between our values.
